promptTemplates.locationInventory: Generate comprehensive 1031 exchange content for {inventoryType} properties in {location}, Fort Worth, TX. Include market analysis, tax benefits, investment opportunities, and local market trends specific to this area.
promptTemplates.locationOverview: Create detailed content about 1031 exchange opportunities in {location}, Fort Worth, TX. Cover property types available, market conditions, growth potential, and why this area is ideal for 1031 exchanges.
promptTemplates.inventoryTypeOverview: Write comprehensive content about {inventoryType} as a 1031 exchange property type in Fort Worth, TX. Include benefits, risks, market trends, and investment strategies.
promptTemplates.locationInventoryCombined: Develop in-depth content about {inventoryType} properties in {location}, Fort Worth, TX for 1031 exchange investors. Include property values, rental rates, appreciation potential, and tax deferral strategies.
